metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1000212 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Mitigation for HTTPoxy vulnerability

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1000212` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lighttpd - 1.4.43-1
lighttpd-mod-authn-gssapi - 1.4.43-1
lighttpd-mod-authn-ldap - 1.4.43-1
lighttpd-mod-authn-mysql - 1.4.43-1
lighttpd-mod-cml - 1.4.43-1
lighttpd-mod-geoip - 1.4.43-1
lighttpd-mod-magnet - 1.4.43-1
lighttpd-mod-mysql-vhost - 1.4.43-1
lighttpd-mod-trigger-b4-dl - 1.4.43-1
lighttpd-mod-webdav - 1.4.43-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lighttpd package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.43-1').
